scripts.postinstall-manifesto: cd node_modules/manifesto.js && yarn install && yarn run build:esmodule
scripts.postinstall-mirador: cd node_modules/mirador && yarn install && rm -r node_modules/manifesto.js && ln -s ../manifesto.js node_modules/manifesto.js && yarn run build && yarn run build:es
scripts.postinstall: yarn run patch && yarn run postinstall-manifesto && yarn run postinstall-mirador
scripts.validate: for file in `ls docs/post/*/*.json`; do yarn run jsonlint $file; if [ $? != 0 ]; then exit $?; fi ; done
